name: Exloring Sapa tours 2Days/1 night, by Bus from Hanoi
description:
Explore
and experience Sapa by road via the new Noibai highway, length 245km. This new
road shortens the travel time from Hanoi to Sapa. Moreover, you will have chance
to admire the beautiful scenery as you travel the longest highway in Vietnam
before you enjoy yourself in Sapa – the fog city.
